text: Mu by’ukuri, Allah ntaterwa isoni no gutanga urugero urwo ari rwo rwose n’iyo rwaba urw’umubu cyangwa ikiwuruta. Ariko kuri ba bandi bemeye, bamenya ko ari ukuri guturutse kwa Nyagasani wabo, mu gihe abahakanye bavuga bati “Allah yari agamije iki mu gutanga uru rugero?” Aruyobesha benshi (abarekera mu buyobe bahisemo), ndetse akanaruyoboresha benshi; kandi nta bandi aruyobesha uretse inkozi z’ibibi gusa
